com.here.android.mpa.search

Class TilesLink

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.search.TilesLink

  • public class TilesLink
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a list of URLs that can be used as base URLs for place tile requests.
    Audience:
    internal

    • Method Detail

      • getDiscoveryResults

        public ErrorCode getDiscoveryResults(GeoBoundingBox area,
                                     double zoomLevel,
                                     ResultListener<DiscoveryResultPage> listener)
                              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        Gets all DiscoveryResultPage results for the bounding area and zoom level. The bounding area and zoom level will be used to calculate a set of tile addresses. A discovery request is created and invoked to retrieve POIs for each tile address. The listener maybe triggered more than once.

        The number of items returned per DiscoveryResultPage (for each tile address) is controlled by the collection size set in the original TilesRequest. For example, the default collection size for the TilesRequest is 20 items. If a bounding area and zoom level generates 10 tile addresses, this can result in up to 200 items being found.

        Parameters:
        area - Result bounding area
        zoomLevel - Zoom level
        listener - Result listener of DiscoveryResultPage
        Returns:
        The ErrorCode representing an appropriate result
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The bounding box area and zoom level combination generates too many tile addresses (maximum limit is 100)
        Audience:
        internal
